/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -g -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/chapter07.dir/frustum.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter07.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter07.dir/sceneao.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter07.dir/scenejitter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter07.dir/scenepcf.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter07.dir/sceneshadowmap.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter07.dir/sceneshadowvolume.cpp.o  -o chapter07 -rdynamic ../ingredients/libingredients.a /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lGL -lpthread -lXrandr -lXxf86vm -lXi -lrt
